title: Alliance for Prosperity
mission: Create a more prosperous world with mission-aligned organiztions

form.name: Name
form.contribution: How might you contribute to the Alliance?

affirmations.smallTitle: Take action to solve real-world problems
affirmations.title: What the Alliance stands for
affirmations.laboratoriaBelief: We believe we have a lot to learn from <0>one another.</0>
affirmations.laboratoriaCopy: Hosting a design-a-thon with young female coding students in Mexico exploring ideas for blockchain technology.
affirmations.wfpBelief: We believe in designing <0>with communities</0>, not for them.
affirmations.wfpCopy: Collaborating to bring financial tools to refugees.
affirmations.cLabsBelief: We believe systems are complex and require <0>collaboration.</0>
affirmations.cLabsCopy: Exploring how to bring more Filipino merchants & consumers  into the formal economy.

categoryText.send: Send money almost everywhere for as little as $0.01
categoryText.lend: Lend Celo Dollars to accelerate speed of delivery and reduce costs
categoryText.earn: Earn a stable, digital asset for lending your talents for various tasks
categoryText.pay: Pay for mobile top ups, utilities, and shopping online with Celo Dollars
categoryText.save: Save Celo Dollars (pegged to USD) to help overcome inflation and build for your future
categoryText.give: Give Celo Dollars to increase transparency, reduce fraud, and increase portability
categoryText.build: Build on Celo or use the open source wallet to deliver innovative customer solutions

benefits.headline: Benefits of collaborating on a mission-driven blockchain
benefits.title: What the Alliance offers
offerings: Build and shape improvements to the Celo platform
